Question
========

One tests H~1~: p = 0.5 against H~2~: p = 0.8 in a random sample of n = 11 observations. Testing quantity is the binomially distributed stochast B, the number of successes in the sample. As the right critical limit, the value 7 is used. The discernment power 1 - Î² is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.87
* 0.91
* 0.96

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.87: Incorrect
* 0.91: Incorrect
* 0.96: Correct
